name: Myth, Magic and Mayhem
description:
Do you like monsters? Creatures from beyond the grave? Being from beyond the grave? Then this is the game for you, with turn-based battles, an adventure far beyond the normal life span and even a special visitor crossing between realms just for you!

I created this as part of a group. I created the turn-based battles and built the levels using the assets created by our artists along with writing the code for the scene transitions. 

Unfortunately due to an issue with WebGL in Unity, I am unable to enable play in browser but it is available for download on Windows, Mac and Linux.
